original_text: and the Lord said to him, “Go down and warn the people so they do not force their way through to see the Lord and many of them perish.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시되 내려가서 백성을 경고하라 백성이 밀고 들어와 나 여호와에게로 와서 보려고 하다가 많이 죽을까 하노라

sentences.original_text: and the Lord said to him
Go down and warn the people
so they do not force their way through

sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 많은 사람이 멸망하는 것을
